author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tense moments prevailed at the Slum Clearance Board tenements at Ayanavaram on Saturday night after four men hacked to death a 45-year-old Puthiya Bharatham functionary.

The murder took place in full public view.

According to police, Arivazhagan, lived at the tenements at Pachai Kallu on Veerasamy Street, Ayanavaram.

Around 8 p.m., Arivazhagan stepped out of his house with a few friends, when the men, who came on two motorcycles, intercepted him and got into an argument with him. In a fit of rage, the men drew out sharp weapons, and hacked him to death.

As they tried to escape, Devaraj, a 50-year-old auto driver, attempted to overpower them.

But the assailants injured him and escaped. Mr. Devaraj was admitted to Kilpauk Medical College and Hospital (KMCH) for treatment.

On hearing about the murder, the Ayanavaram police rushed to the spot and sent the body of Arivazhagan to KMCH for a post-mortem.

The police suspect the involvement of Logu, a local gangster, in the murder due to previous enmity.

Further investigations are on.
title: Party functionary hacked to death
